attributes.action: During Covid-19 force private health care firms to help the NHS at no cost.
attributes.additional_details: Force private health care to provide a number beds, at no cost to the NHS or public set up for the Covid-19 pandemic.
attributes.background: During the outbreak of the Covid-19 virus, the nation should be pulling together not looking to make a profit out of a nation in need. The private health care sector should be force to work along side the NHS at no cost to the NHS. To help elevate the stress the Covid-19 is causing the NHS.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

Commit to requisitioning private hospital beds amid the COVID-19 pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302610

Temporary nationalisation of private hospitals amid coronavirus pandemic - UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304482

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
